content:
ListSortDirection Enum

Definition

Specifies the direction of a sort operation.

In this Article

public enum ListSortDirection
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ListSortDirection

Remarks

ApplySort and ApplySort use this enumeration.

Fields

Ascending

Sorts in ascending order.
Descending

Sorts in descending order.
